name: oscar land
short_description: This project is built around  Making Movies, from screenplays to the Red Carpet,  Oscar night. The Little Shop OF, will have information for writers, actors, anyone wanting to work in the Movie business, in the form of books, screenplay writing downloads. As well as other items not just for writers and people making movies. Memorabilia, clothes, bedding ,household items,electronic and so on.   The blog for this site will have up to date casting calls, jobs for crew, and extras. A listing of other jobs needed while pursuing the Dream.  Writers jobs and notices of  contests and call for submissions for TV pilots and  Movie scripts. And more!
summary: Start to finish, the Making of Movies, who,what that intells.
